basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers with orange red flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, with white or yellow dots, flower color orange red or orange yellow

maintenance.soil: 3 parts of leaf mold or peat moss, 2 parts of garden soil, 3 parts of sand or vermiculite
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, may grow in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Once every 10 days with some liquid manure or compound fertilizers
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and diseased branches timely
